title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - 3 Largo Feira
description: Large free public P on area of fair (Largo da Feira) that happens each 2nd and 4th Monday (when impossible to park night before). It is illuminated but not fully leveled. Near secondary road with low traffic by night. Easy walking distance (400m) till town center.

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - 11 Rua Olheirão
description: Difficult to park in this a little mountainous town so the free illuminated parking in front of a school (700 m away from center) is interesting out lessons timetable. Hyper calm except around 8:15 when buses and cars drop off children.

title: (3670) Cambra - 2 CM1290
description: Service area with free park. the circular hiking route is signposted. nearby restaurants.

title: (3670-040) Cambra - CM1290
description: Very nice place to Park day and night. Surrounded by nature and river beach. With fresh water point, barbecue and table to have a nice meal with family and friends.

title: (3670) Campia - CM1282-1
description: Nice area by the river with picnic table shaded, barbecue available, suitable for fishermen, very good water quality. small sandy beach and grass on the shady river. we hear the cars passed from the highway but not disturbing.

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place for meditation under a large oak tree on a dolmen hill. Also accessible via dirt road for large mobile homes xxl. Very good turnaround. Going around the hill to make a turn is quite possible. Unfortunately, the entrance to the inside of the dolmen is not accessible. But a quiet retreat for nature lovers.

title: (3660) - N227
description: If you looking for a place to sleep a few hours in a middle of a roadtrip this place may help you as much as it helped me...

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 3 Largo Feira
description: Relatively quiet P with good space for big motorhomes but with big trees. Good start point for a visit to this nice small town. It is mountain bike center (see photo) including long flat bicycle track (Ecovia do Vouga) along previous train line that follows Vouga river deep valley, that has here very long stone bridge nearly over historic center as well as old steam locomotive on eastern top. As fare area is just opposite side of road (Largo da Feira), it may be busy on previous hours and along (once a month).

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 5 Porto Salto
description: Free public P in front of school (Escola Secundária) of Vizela small town, leveled and illuminated, either with or without trees. It lies 1 km away from historic center and long stone bridge ex-train and at higher level than town. Very quiet out of school activity.

title: (3660) - 1983 Rua Barroco
description: Parking for the river pools of Poço Azul. No prohibition signs and room for a few campers. The roads here can be very narrow and steep, I wouldn't recommend anything other than a small motorhome (>6m) trying to get here, we barely passed through the villages on the way. Beautiful scenery all around.

name: Camping Vouzela Park
title: () Camping Vouzela Park
description: Municipal campsite of Vouzela. Swimming pool, good reception and in full nature.

title: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
title_short: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
description:
Small car park next to the old station for 2 or 3 quiet flat motorhomes accessible to any size motorhome
Departure of hiking or cycling the old railway line is equipped for bicycles and pedestrians
Ideal for nature lovers

title: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
title_short: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
description: Nice Park out of high season (summer). Not caravan permitted but nobody is there in Autumn and Winter. We were alone!

title: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
title_short: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
description: Convenient service area and parking near the thermal baths, but not used as a swimming pool, but mostly medical. All free and very quiet. Not suitable for motorhomes longer than 6m. Visiting the village and hot spring is a real pleasure. There is an outdoor pool on site, 10 minutes walk.

title: (3680) Rua Da Pereira - 49 Rua São João
title_short: (3680) Rua Da Pereira - 49 Rua São João
description: Place next to the cemetery. Flat and perfect for one night. There was nothing else in this area. It has garbage cans. No more service. very quiet night

title: (3660) - Unnamed Road
description: Top of a hill with a view over everything around. Seems isolated, only 2 cars the entire night. Parked on the side of the road.

title: (3670) Vouzela - N228
description: Appart from being on a side road its a nice spot, fresh spring water, good shade, clean toilet, very nice view,

name: Bioparque de Carvalhais
title: (3660) Bioparque de Carvalhais
description: Biopark camping with swimi gpool ( not included) very nice place by the mountains. Open May to October. Contact for the rest of the year.

title: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul -
description: Self service laundry (laundry) in the parking lot of an Intermarché

title: (3660-510) São Pedro do Sul - 96 Rua São Vicente de Paula
title_short: (3660-510) São Pedro do Sul - 96 Rua São Vicente de Paula
description: Next to the supermarket there is a small dead end street with (sloping) parking spaces. Suitable for visiting the place, not for sleeping.

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - N16
description: Very quiet place to stay. Coffee and mini market nearby.

title: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
title_short: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
description: Has a laundry self-Service, and supermarket, has a little place for breakfast and free bathrooms.

title: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
title_short: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
description: Big parking with lots of space. restaurant nearby, recreation area, walks, bicycle track and toilets.

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - CM1269
description: Quiet park to rest. Surrounded by nature. The water

title: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
title_short: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
description: Drinking water fountain. You have to be patient because the flow is low but the water is fresh and I think untreated. There is no indication of control or not but a local confirmed to me that it was drinkable and there is a sign in Portuguese which also suggests that it is drinkable (something like "provision by the town hall ")

title: (3660) Gamoal -
description: It feels like being in the land of Lord of the Rings. A very nice spot, a little windy but with a magnificent view. We witnessed a magnificent sunset. No one around.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
description: Quiet carpark close to Lidl and park with playground and skate park. the park seems to host a market (don't know which days). no specific cat park spaces for campervans

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - N16
description: Nice rest area with beautiful views, good for lunch or just to stop for break.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park next to the river beach of pouves with some picnic tables and a small animal-friendly beach. Very narrow road not recommended for caravans only for vans. I spent a night there to sleep, very quiet, only dogs barking in the houses in the neighborhood

title: (3660) Bairro Ponte de Manhouce - 5 Bairro Ponte de Manhouce
title_short: (3660) Bairro Ponte de Manhouce - 5 Bairro Ponte de Manhouce
description: Parking at local park, big enough for vans. We were only here during the day, but there was no apparent overnight ban.

title: (3660) - Unnamed Road
description: A place with a great view in the moutains.

name: Retiro da Fraguinha
title: (3660) Retiro da Fraguinha
description: Camping in beautiful mountain surroundings. We did not stay there because we were just passing through, but would be a reason to come back if necessary. ;-) Attention relatively cool, there in the middle of the mountains.

title: (3660-043) Candal -
description: In the heart of nature at the end of a fairly long path, passable by 4x4 or motorhome. The place is peaceful, you feel like you are alone in the world. In the distance, a few wind turbines on a bed of heather and broom. We spent the night there without any problem For nature lovers! Please leave the place clean :)

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
description: Forecourt of a small chapel with centuries-old olive trees. Drinking water tap next door. Access a bit complicated: it's easier to get in and out in reverse.

address.street: R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
description: Old Cedrim train station with 3 parking spaces and 2 more for the disabled. The entrance is somewhat narrow for a motorhome, not recommended for trailers narrow area to maneuver.

title: (3660-044) Candal -
description: Just a small parking lot for those who suffered from the climbs. We spent a quiet night there. no car. a little sight. passage of electric cable not terrible but it helps out.

title: (4540) Cabreiros -
description: Place in the middle of nature near ruins and wind turbines. Accessible only by 4x4 from the track departing from Cabreiros.

title: (3750-561) Macieira de Alcôba - Unnamed Road
description: Small quiet corner at the exit of the village with a large stone swimming pool in the shape of a circle. Quite nice hike start. Drinking water from a natural spring. No installation provided for Motorhome. No trade in the village.

title: (3660) - Unnamed Road
description: A place in the mountains with a awsome view .there's some trees where you tchill for a little while and enjoy the view of the morning in mountains.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Unnamed Road
description: A parking lot off the curve of a small road with little traffic at a lookout point with a great swing (suitable for two).

title: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
description: São João do Monte. Large parking next to a park with trees. Tables, BBQ, water (tap on the speaker on the parking side). Main interest: nice little river bath well equipped (WC and showers open today) 100 m below. Between Àgueda and Tondela (southwest of Viseu). Disadvantage: 25 km of winding road (N 230) Easier access by exit 12 of the A 25 (Campia).

title: (3740) - N328
description: It's a park in a calm village in front of the church.  With water.

title: (3740) Paradela - 410 N328
description: Carpark a few metres from the ciclopista and the praia fluvial. carpark used by employees of the company next door. empty during the weekend.cars start coming in around 8.30am during the week. 2 bar/café close by on the ecopista. restaurant not open end of march. Lidl about 3km away. very quiet and nice view.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools

title: (3660) - N228
description: Small picnic or sleeping area, with barbecue and water. Near soccer fields and games for children. Very basic but little help if you are around. Nearby road.

title: (3730) Junqueira -
description: Nice shaded area (I didn’t take a picture of it but it’s there, really tall trees - the picture is the view from the trees) next to the road so pretty safe with many picnic tables and a nice view over the valley

title: (3465-153) Santiago de Besteiros - 67 Rua São Tiago
title_short: (3465-153) Santiago de Besteiros - 67 Rua São Tiago
description: Fairly large parking lot with paved floors. We stopped only to eat but it looks quiet, in a small village at the bottom of the mountain.

title: (3730) - EM612
description: Place, near a small chapel, where its charm is due to its wild character and its beautiful view!

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
description: Nice, quite place ideal for day or overnight. At the city park with lots of playing for kids. 2m walk from city center with many shops around. (Shade in the Summer). don’t miss the river beach at Pessegueiro do Vouga

title: (3730) Junqueira - 223 Rua São Miguel
description: Place with 4 picnic tables and with access to public showers

title: () - Unnamed Road
description:
Spacious flat place, good for visiting the magical village of Drave, walk 3.5 km until you get there. Easy route to the village and quite difficult on the return, since it is always uphill. There are about 300m of unpaved road to the place of overnight stay, it is not advisable to pass this place with the motorhome dirt road with parts with many deep holes.
Good trails.

title: (3515) Ribafeita - Rua Igreja
description: Ribafeita, Viseu, Portugal. Large parking space without facilities, just outside the village on the edge of the forest. Igrea Matriz, church and cemetery.

title: (3475) Ramalhal - N230
description: Pick nick

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Small launderette with dryer very clean and maintained.  Attention choose the program before starting otherwise it chooses by default. A very nice manager is on site but only speaks Portuguese.

name: Greenval | Rural Camping
title: (3730-180) Greenval | Rural Camping
description:
About us ➡️ A project by a couple, Isabel and João, who decided in 2016 to achieve their life goals: living in peace and tranquility in nature, having moved from Porto to a rural village at an altitude of 860m, located in Serra da Freita! They bought 15 000m2 of wilderness, where they’ve been working on a sustainable rural project, in collaboration with the local community. 

What we do ➡️ We grow several fruits and greens, and raise chickens for their eggs. We also produce artisanal pizzas, biscuits, jams and liqueurs. 

We provide Yoga & Ecotherapy programs, contemplative hikes and rural experiences with the local inhabitants. 

Parking conditions ➡️ There are 6 spots next to the main house, with a view over the valley, and even the sea in the distance. 

Experiences ➡️ We provide several pre-booked activities (prices and conditions vary). 

?Yoga & Ecotherapy
?Massages and sound & vibrations with Tibetan singing bowls
?Claytherapy
?Contemplative hikes
?Hiking with the donkey
?Conversations with the villagers

Worth checking out in the vicinity
?Ponte 516 Arouca - Suspended footbridge 
?Paiva Walkways
?Centro Interpretativo das Pedras Parideiras 
?Freita Weather Radar
?Rota da Água e da Pedra - Outeiro dos Riscos
?Paraduça Bread House
?Pontemieiro artisanal cheese maker
?Lunch and dinner in the restaurant "Mira Freita" (regional restaurant right here in Felgueira) 

Welcome!

title: (3475) - 100 Rua Outeirinho
description: Water tap can be easily approached with campers. According to the label, it is not controlled drinking water. According to information from the villagers, it is spring water. Here in town water is bottled and sold. Nearby behind the sports bar it has a gray and black water disposal.

title: () - EM612
description: A completely isolated spot on a slightly rough and muddy 4x4 trail, sheltered by rocky hills. We hiked to the top of eastern hill in the morning to watch the sun rise over the valley and the views were lovely!

title: (3475-031) Caramulo - Rua Jean Lucart
description: Nice village with typical shops, very quiet, 120 m from the Coimbra Museum.

title: (3660) Pindelo dos Milagres - Unnamed Road
description: Possibility to park several vans, possibility to sleep, there can be evenings so not necessarily calm all the time, small beach for swimming and sunbathing, leave the road to take a clean dirt road not chaotic a motorhome does not pass , drive for 10min on the way to reach the place leave the place clean !

title: (3475-031) - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3475-031)  - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Car park of a former closed public establishment and of a former club. Flat and tarred place, easy access by N230 or N230. 3. Shops at 350 m, Museum and toilets at 200 m. Quiet and safe place, calm night. On the passage of a short hike loop (PR1) of 7.4 km to discover the environment of Caramulo. Breathtaking view over the plain.

address.street: ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga

title: (3740) - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (3740)  - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Very nice place with all over the valley and the sea in the sun unfortunately it was raining. Calm spent one night, WC present but closed.

address.street: Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha

title: (3465-153) Campo de Besteiros - 574 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3465-153) Campo de Besteiros - 574 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: water tap from a spring. Good access and exit possible. Long vehicles with trailers can also be parked without any problems.

title: (4540) Cabreiros -
description: Large flat surface to land in the middle of the ruins of the mine. Absolute tranquility, very few walkers during the day, and no one at night. To access the nearest waterfall, the trails are not easy to find, you have to go to the village above. Superb little hike where you pass through the galleries of the mine to access a heavenly place, be careful with young children, the path is steep. Access to the sector for large vehicles is quite tense, if not impossible, the roads are very narrow and dangerous.

title: (3510) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to a chapel from 1678 and renovated in 2006, a square, BBQ building and children's playhouse. On a hill so it can be windy but enough space to find a sheltered spot. At 100m from a 4/5G mast

title: (4540) - Unnamed Road
description: Enchanting place to spend time relaxing. LEAVE CLEAN!

title: (4540) - EM621
description: Parking place with picnic area, near the waterfalls of Frecha da Mizarela with nice view of the mountains. Quiet during the night.

title: (3740) - 82 Rua da Pereira
description:
Small cars only!
Parking in front of 2 bars. You can make a route to see the Cabreia waterfall where you can bathe.

title: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
description: Quiet place to spend the night, around a beautiful pond. Stone table fitted on site. Easy access path in a non-4x4 VW van. A couple came by around 9 p.m. walking their dog, he greeted us kindly, and continued on his way without reproaching us.

title: (3750) Préstimo -
description:
Beutiful river beach surrounded by nature. with i think only in the summer.
place to Park and sleep. very quiet and calm

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga -
description: There is a small parking bay right by the old mines "Parque das Minas do Braçal". Very quiet, you can only hear the river. Further back in the facilities, there is also a small waterfall. There is nothing outside of nature here. Take your rubbish back with you. Thank you. It is of course not for large motorhomes, just for vans and smaller ones. The way need patience.

title: (3660) Figueiredo de Alva -
description: Not very good access for motorhome but good enough for camping car. Quiet place surrounding by nature.

title: (3740-418) Dornelas - Unnamed Road
description: Great little spot by the creek. Quiet and peaceful with a few spots for campers and motor homes. There is water and picnic tables but the toilets were locked when we were here. There is a gorgeous hike to an amazing waterfall nearby. There was nobody there when we went and it was magic. This place is a hidden gem, incl public toilets with toilet paper. enormous amount of benches and public bbq's

title: (3475) - Unnamed Road
description: A small uneven parking lot for hikers at 1006m altitude on the road just below the summit of Caramulinho (1075 m). There is a large trash can and picnic table with a great view. Fire is forbidden and please respect the fauna and flora. A really quiet place with no through traffic. An approximately 8 km (approx. 2.5 h) long circular hiking trail also begins.

title: (4540) - EM511
description: Picnic / barbecue area / walking paths beautiful views

title: (4540) Albergaria da Serra - M511
description: Parking to do the PR15 route of the Parideiras stones. Ample parking spaces and 2 explicitly for large vehicles such as motorhomes or buses. There is a picnic area right next door.

title: (3510) Viseu - Estrada Florestal de Mozelos
description: There's not one specific spot, it's a nice forest where we believe you could park anywhere, it's full off spots, some of them would require a good ground clearance such as 4×4 vehicle, but some  spots are reachable with a simple CC

title: (3660-097) São Pedro do Sul - CM1123
description: Small vantage point. Very nice view over the valley in which there is a small village. However, you can hear the wind turbines.

name: NaturVeredas, Refúgio da Freita
title: (4540) NaturVeredas, Refúgio da Freita
description:
Small campsite with basic services, located at 900m altitude. 
Good starting point for hikers.

title: (4540-013) Arouca - Zona de Merendas, Estrada da Serra da Freita
title_short: (4540-013) Arouca - Zona de Merendas, Estrada da Serra da Freita
description: Very secluded picnic area so if you are looking for peace and quiet.

address.street: Zona de Merendas, Estrada da Serra da Freita

title: (4540) Burgo -
description: In the middle of green at the end of the path there is a parking space for max. 2 campers. Relatively flat surface, accessibility okay. There is a drinking water tap at the beginning of the path and a barbecue area on the site itself.

title: (4540) Moldes - CM326
description: Picnic park, balcony and an incredible view. Nice place and little moved, but at least not on the day I estive it.

title: (4540) Albergaria da Serra -
description: Beautiful place not far from the main road, but the access is only 4x4. Maybe if you have a SUV with a good ground clearance it’s ok. Nice view to the mountains.

title: (3460) - Rua Linha
description: Dão greenway car park 15 km south-west of Viseu. Former station of Parada de Gonta in a cul-de-sac. Café closed in 2018 from 15/8 to 4/9. 2 empty houses this August 23. Flat parking on bitumen. We can hear the road a bit (IP 3). Interesting for cyclists. Popular restaurant at Farminhāo train station, 3 km towards Viseu. Tap in front of this restaurant (5 km by road).

title: (4540) Urrô - EM511
description: Lots of locations. near a chapel below a road with very little passage. water point . exceptional view of the valley. we did not spend the night there because at altitude.

title: (3750) Águeda - R. Vela
description: 2-seater area for large motorhome. 2 spaces for small motorhomes. Typical village, friendly neighborhood. You will find a bistro there which is a friendly boss, a former German Swiss worker. Beautiful bells which stops at 10 am.

title: (3730) Vale de Cambra - 143 EM548
description: River beach parking lot. There is no service. The bar is open in summer, very calm river beach

title: (3460) Tondela - 130 Bairro Ponte
description: River Beach Parking.

title: (3515) Viseu - Estrada São Gens
description: Parking area for departure walk, stone picnic table, quiet for the night (a little dirty area nevertheless)

title: (3850-703) Ribeira de Fráguas - EM553
description: PARQUE DE MERENDAS - RIBEIRA DE FRÁGUAS Fantastic place to make a stop. Picnic area by the river. It has tables, wastebaskets, grills and even a net to play volley / badminton. It has bathrooms (super clean) and outside a sink with a handle tap. A small walking route along the very cool river also leaves from this picnic area.

title: (3515-114) Viseu - 39 Avenida Aquilino Ribeiro
description: Clean and Airy Laundry outside of Viseu.  Free WIFI too. Parking ample parking on road. Open 7 days a week

title: () Viseu - Rua Fonte
description: Parking on paved street, very quiet, next to a nice natural park. No service, ideal for one night.

title: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
title_short: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
description:
Ample parking on the outskirts of viseu.
Flat and with a supermarket, Burger King and Leroy Merlin next door.
Quiet and without services, but the motorhome area 1 km away

title: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
title_short: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
description: In the absence of places in the nearby ASA, there is this place where you can go to night.

title: (4540) Meitriz - Beco da Costeira
description: Nice and calm spot just by the river and surrounded by nature.

name: Casa Estêvão
title: (3660-328) Casa Estêvão
description:
This is a remote village that welcomes life. 
• Observe and feed the farm animals(sheep, goats, pig, rabbits, chickens, fishes)
• Picking a variety of fruits directly from the trees 
• Tasty products from the farm

title: (3510- 073) Viseu - Avenida Capitao Homem Ribeiro 199
description: 8 places on tarmac. Waste bins, gray water drain, free water with tap, two bins with tap, toilet door. FON Wi-Fi point nearby. Not far downtown and funicular.

title: (4540) - Rua da Igreja
description: Small place near the Paiva River

title: (3850-835) - N16-3
description: A beautiful spot to take time in the middle of the trip, have snacks, and maybe swim in the nice river.

title: (3730-261) Vale de Cambra - 417 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (3730-261) Vale de Cambra - 417 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: It is new and with all services. It is located in the city center, next to the city park. quiet at night. The 5 pitches are 8 meters long and easily accessible. There is also a moderate amount of traffic during the day and walkers pass by regularly.

title: (3750) Sever do Vouga -
description: Enchanting place to relax and spend time, the ground is sandy but with the 4x4 you can access without problems. LEAVE IT CLEAN!

title: () Viseu - Avenida Emídio Navarro
description: Ample parking

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - A25
description: Fuel Station with free water in pump number #6, has a little of everything: playground, picnic tables, recycling garbage, electric car charge, ATM restaurant and Wi-Fi. Time limit to park and sleep 72 hours.

title: (3460-555) Tondela - 49 Rua Estação
description: At the exit of Tondela by the N2 (road to Canas de S. Maria. Parking of the old station of Tondela on the ecopista do Dāo (greenway south-west of Viseu). Good for cycling, medium for at night (a bit of road noise) A tap open on August 24, 2018, picnic tables, some shade, toilets closed today

title: (3510) Viseu -
description: Laundromat. Excellent service Portuguese, French and English spoken. Very clean. Self service. Cheap. Beside a cafe. Easy to park

title: (4540) Arouca - Rua Sub-Ribes
description: Arouca, caravan park area, picnic area at the entrance of the city. Market day is 2 days every month. The rubbish is knee deep, left after the market. rendering the site filthy resembling the local dump.

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha -
description: Along the river, large flat area recommended by locals which helped us get out of the sand in the offroad spot further down the trail

title: (3750) Sernada do Vouga - R. Parque Fluvial
title_short: (3750) Sernada do Vouga - R. Parque Fluvial
description: Nice picnic area by the river. Lots of space, shade trees, picnic tables and trash cans. Access: follow sign to the fishing spot after the bridge.

title: (4540) Alvarenga - Unnamed Road
description: Cross of Paradihna

title: (3500) Viseu - 110 Rua Arrabalde
description: Huge parking near the old town very quiet.

title: (3460) Tondela - 32 Rua Dr. Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3460) Tondela - 32 Rua Dr. Manuel de Arriaga
description: Near the urban park and contiguous to the municipal mercado, where we find good bread. Unlimited places in the shade or in the sun. very few cars at night, and very quiet. No parking ban, and walks around. Very clean, so to respect. Rua Johao Mathos Fereira

title: (3500-048) Viseu - 144 Rua Arco
description: Huge car park, Monday and Wednesday but market day

title: (4540-117) Arouca - 9 Rua Alferes Diogo Malafaia
description: O Alphaite. Nice, clean laundry. For a few euros extra, you can leave your laundry behind and pick it up a few hours later.

title: (4540) Arouca - CM1251
description: Beautiful spot in the middle of nature! Best view of Arouca city and surroundings. Wc and bar only open in the summer time and a lot of picnic tables. Awesome 4g

title: (3500-401) Viseu - 244 Rua dos Almeida Furtado
description: Lavaplus - Laundry Self Service. Opens 7am and closes 12am

title: (3460) Tondela - 16 Largo República
description: Camara municipal park of tondela

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Municipal swimming pool shower, ask at the reception

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Lots of parking close to the sport area. quiet. close to the forest too and to the hostel. maybe they allow you to shower?

title: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
title_short: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
description: Very quiet place with camping table and trees. And there is a water point

title: (3500-046) Viseu - 276 Rua Cruzeiro
description:
It's a nice place to park or sleep.
It's side by a shopping Palacio de Gelo.
Can go to a shopping walk.
Large space to park motorhomes or sleep.
Not have amenities but in mall you have food, wc and wifi.

title: (3460) Tondela - 100 Rua Cemitério
description: Pretty and quiet parking at the cemetery.

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - EM556
description: Parking is near the road but in the woods, there is no service, several places, in the shade and fallow but very suitable and especially accessible.

title: (3600) Cabril -
description: A river beach in Foz Cabril. Have the place to ourselves in mid April 2022. Facility’s available in season. Cafe, toilets, outdoor showers.

title: (3720-411) Palmaz - Rua dos 22
description: Place in the heart of nature, in the middle of the woods, where total calm reigns. Possibility of finding another place in this maze of paths. Completely passable.

title: (3750-064) Águeda - N230
description: On the N230 a few kilometers after Agueda towards Caramuso. Small fluvial park of Bolfiar, to take the small way well lady 'in slope with height of the bar restaurant on the right before the bridge. Riverside with tables, benches and barbecue. Possible to sleep. More for van or small motorhome less than 7M.

title: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
title_short: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
description: Prince Perfeito Sports Center parking lot

title: (3850-065) Albergaria-a-Velha - nº5 Rua Hospital
description: Public park to visit the Torreão and the Municipal Library and other monuments, downtown. We can also park to sleep. Quiet and well lit area.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 196 Rua Balneário Termal
description: Near to N2 rout, public swimming pool from July to September, spa in “Termas do Carvalhal”. Mini market.

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - 3850 N1
description: Pingo Dice with self-service laundry and car wash. WiFi in the store and in the Burger King next to it.

title: (3850-073) Albergaria-a-Velha - 11A Rua Doutor José Henriques
description: Laundry open 24 hours. Simple and cheap. Next to the old fire station

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - 3850 N1
description: Petrol station with lpg at cheap price, friendly staff, speak some English.

title: (3600) Mamouros - CM1154
description: Small parking next to the pleasant pool, sloping

title: (3750) Castanheira do Vouga - 912 N336
description: Fluvial Park and Praia da Redonda car park, day and night in River Park on the banks of the river Águeda. With Pic-NIC tables and barbecues available. Very pleasant and very cool place. Very quiet nights and no noise. Exceptional location that must be preserved.

title: (4540) Vilarinho - R326-1
description: Not allowed for cars longer than 5 meters. Furthermore, a very nice place on the water

title: (3850-027) Albergaria-a-Velha - 44 Rua da Carvoeira
description: Quiet parking place near some villas. Very close from the major north/south road. Albergaria-a-Velha it’s a nice town for shopping groceries or other services. I stopped here a few times.

title: (4540) Canelas - R326-1
description: Top parking of paiva bridges. Perfect for sleeping. Very quiet at night. They do not pose any problems while sleeping

title: (3600) Cabril - 9 CM1129
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (3720) Pinheiro da Bemposta - 850 IC2
description: It is a picnic area with a lot of shade, it has a barbecue area and tables to eat in the shade of the trees. It also has ample parking for a motorhome and access is easy to get to.

title: (3750) Lamas do Vouga - N1
description: Convenient area attached to the road. We stopped to cook and nobody told us anything, we ate on the picnic tables under the trees. The only flaw: enough noise from cars and trucks passing very close. Nice for a quick stop.

title: (3600) Pepim - N288
description: Old road overlooking a football field. a bit off the current road. In the middle of nature but without any particular charm. Helps out well for one night.

title: (3720-561) Besteiros - 57 Travessa do Sobreiral
description: Drinking water fountain, perfect for filling bottles or tanks, you can stop right in front with the van. The town is really calm.

title: (3505) Viseu -
description: Intermarché Service Area

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - CM1462
description: Estuval picnic park, with green areas, tables and chairs and barbecue. Fountain with drinking water. Very pleasant area with night lighting.

title: (3750) Agueda - Rua dos Comerciantes
description: Simple yet spacious parking lot. Levelled ground

title: (3750) Águeda - 55 Rua Rio Grande
description: Full service station together with 3 motorhomes flat asphalted leveled P, illuminated but without shadow, just aside main road (noisy :-( ), near fire station and easy walking till ÁGUEDA town center every kind of shopping and riverside. Attention ⚠ : every Saturday morning there is the big market in this area. Shops are closed (and good small nice restaurants too...).

title: (3515) Calde - Unnamed Road
description: Nature corner near a dam, a few swimmers during the day, quiet at night. Access by a paved road.

title: (3460) Tondela - Rua Nossa Senhora da Esperança
title_short: (3460) Tondela - Rua Nossa Senhora da Esperança
description: Vila Nova da Raiha, Church of Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, wonderful sleeping place with many possibilities to position the van, outside the village and away.

title: (4540) Alvarenga -
description:
Dark, quiet and flat field/parking
parked there over night to visit the 516arouca bridge

title: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina
title_short: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina
description: ASA - Motorhomes Address Parque la Salette, Oliveira de Azeméis Picnic facilities (picnic park) Municipal swimming pools Sanctuary Category Municipal ASA Location Aveiro (District). Free electricity.

address.street: 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina

title: (4540-021) Albisqueiros - 1916 N225
description: Public toilets, parking over night not recommend. there are markets in the morning.

title: (3520) Santar - N231
description: Parking along N231 across the road from a restaurant.  We parked here for the night alongside 2 oil tankers, great as there are no other Parking in the region.  The restaurant offers good and reasonably priced food. It was quite an unforgettable Portuguese night experience with Jorge, the restaurant patron.  Great to spend the night.  River few steps away, road is quite busy but it gets calmer at night.

title: (3720-475) Pinheiro da Bemposta - Rua do Garcia 322
title_short: (3720-475) Pinheiro da Bemposta - Rua do Garcia 322
description: Pitch for a campervan maximum 6 meters. 4x4 recommended (see Photo) Access to services via the adjacent mill/hostel. 200 year old lovingly but simply restored water mill, with garden, river, waterfalls, barbecue on site. Pitch a bit uneven. Shim boards are available.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 1879 N228
description: Drinking water fountain well suited for filling water canisters. Large parking space.

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking lot along the road without services ideal for visiting the magnificent city (the sky project). and eat a good homemade ice cream 5 euros for 2 scoops but really excellent. I think it's possible to sleep there but it's not the goal it's only to visit.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - N228
description: Small dirt parking off the road. Surrounded by Eucalyptus trees. We just stopped to got for a walk, but for one night, it could be a nice, quiet spot.

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua Anunciação Helena
description: Large parking at the edge of the water and close to the city. Looks rather calm. Fountain not far Suitable for large size

title: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
title_short: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
description: washing machine internet cafe

title: (3850-289) Albergaria-a-Velha - 16 N16
description: They swapped our swedish propane bottle to a portuguese one and also got a clip-on adapter

title: (3600-136) Castro Daire - 89 Avenida António Serrado
description: Just off an n2 roundabout, 10 minutes walk into the town. Car park shaded by trees. There are picnic benches to sit at.  Day parking only.  we have a 7m motor home, and as car park, was pretty empty could manoeuvre without a problem.  if car park is busy, then probably more suited to a smaller camper van.

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - EM594
description:
Free toilets, outdoor showers, childplay area,
nice river walk.

I'm here in March and its closed, maybe due to Coronavirus.

the parking nearby is for cars only.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 6 Rua Cabine
description: Parking

title: (3520) Santar -
description:
Really clean (keep it that way!) and quiet place to stop for a break or spend the night at the square near a chapel at the end of a small village. 
Shaded by trees and not much traffic.

title: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Easy parking above a sports field, with beautiful views and no lighting. Located in a quiet residential area, uncrowded at night, little traffic in the morning, some dogs barking at night. Not the most charming place, but good enough for one night.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
title_short: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
description: Park day/night near the church

title: (3600) Castro Daire -
description:
Idyllic place by the river for swimming and barbecuing. Free of charge. Toilets available but were closed (May 2023). No waste containers installed at the moment. Quiet night, but well attended when the weather is bathing.
Enjoy nature!

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 7 Largo Igreja
description: Public toilets, church and cleaning water on a fountain to drink. Trilho da Lombeira passes here

title: (3505-390) Viseu -
description:
Helped us switch our Swedish gas bottle for a Portuguese one, complete with adapter to fit our car. Very helpful and friendly staff. 
Muito obrigado!

title: (4550) Real - Unnamed Road
description: Clay trail leading to what appears to be a church. No one on the horizon, the spot is relatively clean compared to what we have already seen in Portugal, and above all the view is breathtaking. Thank you for leaving the right impeccable, even if it means picking up some papers that are not yours.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 16 Rua Raposeira
description:
For filling clean water only.
Public place.

title: (3750) Segadães - 1838 Rua Professor Fernando Bessa
description: Merendas Park ideal for picnic barbecue table calm ...

title: (4550) Real -
description: Very nice picnic area (height: ~640m) with four tables and two covered grill stations. There is a water point and toilets, but they are not always open. The view is breathtaking and there is also a great swing. Next to the square there is a small chapel and a small stage.

title: (3865) Salreu - Autoestrada do Norte
description: Noisy service area because there are many trucks. The cafeteria staff is quite rude. Clean bathrooms. BEWARE: if you stop to sleep and entertain yourself because you have breakfast and go with three children and a dog, you have made a mess, because as long as you spend 12 hours, at the exit of the toll from Porto, you will be struck 90 euros.

title: (4540) - 1889 N326
description: Picnic area and views of the mountains. Possibility to go online for motorhomes, 2 places. Only for the day and a short break, the land seems to be of the church.

title: (4540) Espiunca - 12 Rua 1 de Maio
description: Water point

title: (4540) - EM505
description: New area in Espiunca, at the beginning of the Paiva river walkways

title: (3600-102) Castro Daire - 24 Rua da Portela
description:
Picnic area with a bombastic view, drinking water and the possibility to stand overnight.
Located on a 10km circular hiking trail. (information board at the church in the village)

Access rather nothing for huge ships.

title: (4540) Espiunca - EM505
description: Ground parking and boil, busy during the day and very quiet at night. Not very good entry. Ideal to access "the Paiva river footbridges"; spectacular infrastructure designed to take a walk of 8km enjoying a fantastic landscape. It is advisable to check out the entrance to the Tourism Office of Arouca beforehand

title: (4690) - Er 321
description: Portas do Montemuro, great place with a 360 degree view of the valleys. next door is a gas station. little traffic in the evening. the dog yells at the gas station at night. compensated the morning after

title: (3440) Nagozela - 2 Largo Milénio
description: Great parking spot in the village of Nagozela. Flat space for at least 14 big vans. Easy access. Very calm. With tables, barbeques, pinpon table and playground for children. There is a tiny library to exchange books inside a fridge! Very close to the local old school where many workshops are being hosted every week. Including language exchange every first Tuesday of each month at 20:00. Sometimes there are ceramic workshops and so on. Very friendly people open to receive travelers. Local cafe is 50 meters away for a nice coffee in the morning. Local minimarket 80 meters away with a very friendly owner. River beach 20minutes walking distance.

title: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
title_short: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
description: Laundry Self-service.

address.street: 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães

title: (3750) - Rua Pateira
description: Parking surrounded by greenery, with a beautiful lawn and picnic tables, two wooden walkways that lead to two gazebos to enjoy the view! It is possible to take walks along the hearths and fish for shrimp species much loved by the Chinese. Quiet place with toilet and trash! Great for those looking for shade and wanting to relax.

title: (3860-328) Beduido - 22 Rua de Santo Amaro
description: Beautiful location, shaded and barbecue available. The only drawback is the need for drinking water tokens and no information on where to buy them ... Otherwise the rest is free.

title: (3860) Estarreja - 19 Travessa de Santo Amaro
description: Picnic area with parking space and water fountain

title: (3750) Óis da Ribeira - 78 Rua Pateira
description: Public park just to touch the lake.  precise place where we have spent 3 campers without problems.  There is a fountain nearby.  There are no more services.  beautiful place for dotmir

title: (3865) Fermelã - Rua do Vale
description: Free space near water, very quiet location

title: (3850) Angeja - 28 N230-2
description:
Good on the highway but also in a river.
It has drinking water, bathrooms, and tables to eat, although the bathrooms are closed.

title: (4690) Tendais - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area by the side of the road with spectacular views. Space for one or two vans.

title: (3750-439) Fermentelos - 84 Rua Pateira
description: Place with lots of space, on the edge of a large natural lake, the "Pateira de Fermentelos". Snack tables, cold water fountain, shade, walking routes, fishing, etc. No services.

title: (3865) Salreu - 50 Rua do Cadaval
description: Parking of the Interpretative Centre of Ria de Aveiro. Plenty of space for parking. Big picnic area with shade. Possible to rent bikes for full day, half day or 1 hour. Lovely paths for walking or biking. To sleep, better on the small road on the left of the canal, near the football field. Weekends may be busy.

title: (3860-249) Estarreja - Rua Doutor António Madureira
description:
Beautiful official parking space of the municipality on the outskirts of the city at the park. Ver, disposal free of charge possible. Maximum length of stay 48 hours with electricity. The places with electricity are cordoned off by iron beams. In 200 meters in the Cafe Piscina (along the orange pillars at the meat shop directly to the left of the building passage) you will receive two keys from the friendly staff after entering the license plate number.
One for the iron beam and one for the electrical box. To be returned after 48 hours on a trust basis. Muito obrigada!!

title: (3860-352) Estarreja - 61 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Self service laundry. Brand new. Really clean and well organized. Prices are 4e for 10.5kg and 1.5e for 15 min for drying. FYI, it’s three doors from the “cafe piscina” where you can get the keys for the caravan service area. Safe trip =)

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Rua Salgada
description: Spot for one campervan under a tree between the road and the lake. It's not a busy road, and it's very quiet at night. It's almost level. The only thing is there are a lot of churches around, so you can hear bells all the time. Otherwise it's a beautiful view of the lake.

title: (3860-367) Estarreja - 72 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Parking area near the center but off the road with wooded area and park next door. Gas station on top

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 45 Rua Minhoteira
description: The first place already indicated was too windy so we stayed here. Nice view on the lake. There is a road next to this place but not very busy. We had quiet night and beautifull morning.

title: (4690) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot on top of a mountain with 360 degree views of the surrounding valleys. The milieu of a wind farm wind but so tranquility assured at night and in the morning! Wind turbine noise is not annoying at all. Access is by paved road. No toilet but water points, picnic table and garbage.

name: Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
title: (3750-064) Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
title_short: (3750-064) Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
description: Nice campsite with swimming pool, quiet, trees.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 32-36 Rua Minhoteira
description: Lake side spot. We stayed over night with no problem. Very quiet wonderful location

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Small spot beside the road, right by the lake. A lot of people fishing here, so I believe you can't really stay here for that long. But it's definitely fine for a night.

title: (3860-362) Estarreja - R. Des. Correia Teles
description: Laundromat

title: (3860-210) Estarreja - 55 Rua Manuel Ferreira da Silva
title_short: (3860-210) Estarreja - 55 Rua Manuel Ferreira da Silva
description: Modern service station with free air and water and self service laundry there is also a car wash

title: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
title_short: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
description: Public parking lot without access control and security guard, but is illuminated during the night and very quiet. On the main street near to the place there are some services like bakery, cafeteria, ATM and the Municipal Market.
